verses.name: 1 Kings 19:1
verses.text: And Ahab told Jezebel all that Elijah had done, and withal how he had slain all the prophets with the sword.

verses.name: 1 Kings 19:2
verses.text: Then Jezebel sent a messenger unto Elijah, saying, So let the gods do to me, and more also, if I make not thy life as the life of one of them by to morrow about this time.

verses.name: 1 Kings 19:3
verses.text: And when he saw that, he arose, and went for his life, and came to Beer–sheba, which belongeth to Judah, and left his servant there.
